abstract: A little more than a year after acquiring Genentech, Roche said Thursday that its profits for the first half of this year had risen by 37 percent from the same period a year before as exceptional costs associated with the merger had fallen.
snippet: A little more than a year after acquiring Genentech, Roche said Thursday that its profits for the first half of this year had risen by 37 percent from the same period a year before as exceptional costs associated with the merger had fallen.
lead_paragraph: A little more than a year after acquiring Genentech, Roche said Thursday that its profits for the first half of this year had risen by 37 percent from the same period a year before as exceptional costs associated with the merger had fallen.

headline.main: Roche Profit Up on Genentech Synergies
